```{r, include = F}

# Nobel Prizes

tribble(
  ~Year, ~Type, ~Desc,
  1903, "Physics", "Awarded for her work on radioactivity with Pierre Curie and Henri Becquerel",
  1911, "Chemistry", "Awarded for the discovery of radium and polonium"
) %>% 
  brief_entries(
    glue::glue("Nobel Prize in {Type}"),
    Year, 
    Desc
  )
```


# Publications


```{r googlescholar, include = F}
pubs <- scholar::get_publications("_bVy9pMAAAAJ&hl") %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(author = author %>% 
                  as.character %>% 
                  stringr::str_trim(),
                journal = journal %>% 
                  replace(journal %in% "bioRxiv", "BioRxiv"), 
                first_author = dplyr::case_when(stringr::str_starts(author, "L Mouselimis") ~ TRUE,
                                         TRUE ~ FALSE),
                preprint = dplyr::case_when(journal %in% c("bioRxiv", "BioRxiv") ~ TRUE,
                                     TRUE ~ FALSE)) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(year))
```



```{r}

scholar::get_publications("_bVy9pMAAAAJ&hl")  %>% 
  mutate(author = gsub("\\...", "et al.", author)) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = as.character(year),
    with = author,
    where = journal, 
    .protect = TRUE
  )

```
